game.name: Crossings
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, 추적되는 컨트롤러 지원, VR 전용, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Explore and Fight your way through an ever-changing world in a quest for vengeance and survival in an epic Adventure through the Norse afterlife. Meet fellow lost souls in seamless and wordless VR Co-op as you Block, Dodge, Strike and Power your way through Trolls, Draugr and other dark beings.
